availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonathan Jones (Magoffin County, KY, stud keeper)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, stud keeper. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles Jones and Jemima Jones. Married to Susan Arnett Jones in Magoffin County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1860. Father of Jane Jones. Resident of Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Stud keeper in Magoffin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, p. 447A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 433.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Precinct 4, p. 371B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Magoffin County Marriages, Film 000988583, p. 2.
